title: Yelp: Odd & Obscure
description:
On today's episode of the podcast we debut a brand new series: Yelp: Odd and Obscure, where we will read real reviews for odd things. This episode features Yelp reviews on myself, the moon, and a state penitentiary. Enjoy!

---

A special thanks to HELIX for sponsoring this episode of the podcast.

Visit www.HelixSleep.com/RELAX, take their two minute sleep quiz to get matched with the perfect mattress for you.

Their offer: Up to $200 of ALL mattress orders and two free pillows.
